title: PREFACE

book.title: From Farm to Fortune or Nat Nason's Strange Experience
book.description: 简介： Nat Nason was a poor country boy with a strong desire to better his condition. Life on the farm was unusually hard for him, and after a quarrel with his miserly uncle, with whom he resided, he resolved to strike out for himself....
